name: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentHandling
desc: The interface that handles requests to update the user’s preference for a media item.

items.name: func resolveAffinityType(for: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent, with: (INMediaAffinityTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the affinity type to which the media item is updated.

items.name: func resolveMediaItems(for: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent, with: ([INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the media items for which the user’s preferences are updated.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent, completion: (INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the update media affinity request.

items.name: func handle(intent: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent, completion: (INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the media update affinity request.
